creator: anthony@whitford.com
text:
I think I'm following the instructions, but am unable to build Lenya due to the 
following error:  package org.apache.avalon.excalibur.io does not exist

Specifically, the import:  import org.apache.avalon.excalibur.io.FileUtil
seems to be causing the problem (and it exists in several files).

I checked the Avalon Framework site and the Excalibur javadocs and can't seem 
to see a reference to this package.  Should this be referencing 
org.apache.commons.io.FileUtils instead?

(Note that I am using JDK 1.5 and Cocoon 2.1.9.)

I had the same problem until I edited the build.bat file to remove the old 
ant ... it references an internal ant app...  when I did that, it stopped 
looking for information from the excalibur project. -- hbetts
creator: hendry.betts@viasat.com
andreas@apache.org
text:
Does this problem still occur?
Would anyone mind providing a patch?
